text: Willem Klaas Hoekzema (born 21 July 1939) is a retired Dutch politician of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD) and economist. ==Decorations== {| class="wikitable" style="width:60%;" |- style="background:#ccf; text- align:center;" | colspan=5 |Honours |- ! style="width:80px;"| Ribbon bar !!
